definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: You work on your muscle groups in a certain order.
sentences.chinese: 对各个肌肉群，你是在按照一个特定的顺序进行。

sentences.english: Once fastening bolts, each bolt to ensure that the force evenly.
sentences.chinese: 一旦开始紧固螺栓，要确保各个螺栓均匀受力。

sentences.english: In the basement where Yang is living, there are many aisles leading to different rooms.
sentences.chinese: 在杨生活的这个地下室，有很多通道通往各个房间。

sentences.english: Drainage was to the north and individual channels bifurcate in that direction .
sentences.chinese: 整个水系向北排水，各个河道朝该方向分叉。

sentences.english: I could bunch all the sections together.
sentences.chinese: 我可以把各个部分堆积到一起。

sentences.english: Launch an effort to get together the various departments.
sentences.chinese: 开展将各个部门聚集在一起的工作。

sentences.english: After the individual components were graphed, it was easy to spot this problem.
sentences.chinese: 在对各个组件绘制图表之后，很容易确定此问题。

sentences.english: In fact, it is more of a philosophy that envelops every aspect of the project.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，它更是一种涵盖了项目的各个方面的哲学。

sentences.english: Does water exert the same pressure in all directions?
sentences.chinese: 水向各个方向所施加的压力相同吗？

sentences.english: Today the same is happening in everything from bandwidth to storage.
sentences.chinese: 今天，同样的事情发生在从带宽到存储的各个领域。

sentences.english: Emancipating the mind and run through the infiltration of socialism with Chinese characteristics in all levels.
sentences.chinese: 解放思想贯穿于渗透于中国特色社会主义的各个层面。

sentences.english: Finally, he incorporated some compromises suggested by others into a specific motion.
sentences.chinese: 最后，他整合了一些各个方面建议，得出折衷议案。

sentences.english: First, let's examine the parts of which a solar panel consists.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我们来看一看太阳能集热板包括的各个部件。

sentences.english: The inside of each house depended on the personality of its owner.
sentences.chinese: 每个房间内怎样的布置，这要看各个使用者的性格了。

sentences.english: I plucked all the blossom in my garden into wreaths.
sentences.chinese: 我摘下我花园中所有的娇艳，把它们织成各个桂冠们。

sentences.english: And discusses the various periods of pine construction development.
sentences.chinese: 并论述了各个时期松景营建的发展脉络。

definition: other/the others/else/other than it/in addition to the thing mentioned above
(used for abstract things) a good deal, a lot of
to concentrate/to centralize/to focus/centralized/concentrated/to put together
in large part/the greater part/the majority
